SEARCH
Package io.github.fuzzy39.swingRPG.world.entities

Class Entity

java.lang.Object
io.github.fuzzy39.swingRPG.world.entities.Entity
All Implemented Interfaces:
Drawable
public class Entity extends Object implements Drawable
A BasicEnity represents an actor on the world. They are capable of moving on and between screens. Their behavior and other aspects are managed by their EntityType.
Author:
Fuzzy39
